ComicInfo.Title: Danny's Big Day; Wallow's Dolls
ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s a Littlest Warriors one shot! This adorable stand-alone story of the Bravest Warriors on one of Danny’s earliest birthday parties is filled with all the mischief you could expect when the gang is unleashed upon intergalactic skee-ball, arcades, and ball pits!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ian McGinty | 1 | B | Cover B | Reimena Yee | 2 | Var | 1:15 Variant Cover | Jasmine Goggins | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 07:49:32. [CVDB479302]
ComicInfo.Editor: Cameron Chittock, Rebecca Taylor, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Beth Tezuka, Catbug, Chris Kirkman, Danny Vasquez, Impossibear, Plum, Wallow
